评论详情: Only after a few weeks of usage the arm separated from the frame of the glasses. Please note that I did not use the product on a daily basis. When I did use it was always treated with gentle care.  Vision wise, I had grave difficulties seeing through the lens of the glasses during moderate or low lighting. I have other higher quality sunglasses which I have no issues with vision during low or moderate lighting.  The best thing I can say for this product is that it looks good in appearance. However, the product is of poor quality and the visualization is even worse.
